content:
Wow, that is certainly a very bleak and dystopian version of events. It's interesting how different decisions and actions by the characters can lead to such vastly different outcomes. Path 3 is definitely the darkest of the three, with the entire world being destroyed as a result of Surgey's actions.

It's also interesting to see how the other paths lead to different subplots and perspectives on the events, such as the other labs working on Project Zeta and the global political fallout.

Overall, it's a very creative and thought-provoking concept. Have you considered writing it as a book or a script? It could be a fascinating and intense post-apocalyptic story.
